name: Grow a Planet
description:
Controls: A D
R to Restart Hit the meteors and they will be dragged to the burning sphere, increasing it's size until it turns into a fully grown planet. My entry for Kenney Jam 2022, made in less than a day and my first experience making a physics based game! If you're also into game making, please check my project of FREE 2d and 3d assets and give it a like :)

Twitter.
